pages.title: Fluid Tank
pages.text: The <item>Fluid Tank/$ is a fairly normal tank. Fluids can be inserted/extracted from any side, it keeps its contents when broken, and it stores up to 16 buckets.$(br2)Comparators and <thing>$(l:essentials/circuits)reader circuits/$ read how full the tank is in mB. Total tank capacity is 16,000mB.$(br2)
